original_text: But the people did not think that the king's message was important. They went away to do their own work. One man went to his farm and another man went to his business.
korean_text: 그들이 돌아 보지도 않고 한 사람은 자기 밭으로, 한 사람은 자기 사업하러 가고

sentences.original_text: But the people did not think
that the king's message was important
One man went to his farm
and another man went to his business
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 사람은 자신의 사업으로 갔다
